source.name: Task 4
source.instructions:
**Total Points: 4**

In the `update` function of `projectile-motion.js`, do the following:
- Update the value of the x coordinate of each ball (denoted as `x[i]`) by adding the value of the corresponding `velocity_x` value (`velocity_x[i]`).
- Add the value of `gravity` to the value of `velocity_y`.
- Update the value of the y coordinate of each ball (denoted as `y[i]`) by adding the value of the corresponding `velocity_y` value (`velocity_y[i]`).
